changeSet.sql: create sequence auth_seq; create type euserrole as enum ('ROLE_ADMIN', 'ROLE_INVESTOR', 'ROLE_ENTREPRENEUR'); create table if not exists auth ( id bigint not null constraint auth_pkey primary key, active boolean, password varchar(255), user_role euserrole, totp_secret varchar(255), username varchar(255) constraint auth_uk_on_username unique, person_id bigint constraint auth_fk1_on_person references person );
